name: AltSource, Inc
description:
AltSource was founded in 2004 by Dave Moore and has a rich foundation of openness, diversity, and strong passion for what we do. We care about the wellbeing and success of every employee, customer, and product we build. Our culture and core values feature a compass guided by accountability, innovation, and integrity, and we pride ourselves on making a positive impact on every person and community we serve.
We at AltSource are change agents, strategists, engineers, innovators, and thought leaders. We live in a world of ideation, iteration, and disruption. Our Mission is simple: to deliver the highest-value custom applications to our clients. We ensure seamless integration of emerging technologies and delivery of exceptional future ready custom software solutions, featuring a focus on user experience, mobility, data management, and analytics.
AltSource has been named to the Inc. 5000 List of Fastest Growing Private Companies in the U.S. every year since 2014 and has curated a hand-selected team of more than 150 in-house technical experts.
